meanings.definition: A woman who serves as a co-chair alongside another person, typically in a leadership role.
meanings.sent1: The cochairwoman led the meeting with her colleague.
meanings.sent2: The cochairwoman and her partner worked together to organize the event.
meanings.sent3: The cochairwoman joked that they should both wear matching hats to the meeting.
meanings.sent4: She stood tall, a cochairwoman in the world of business.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cochairwoman in her power suit was unforgettable.
